item.title: A Nightingale Falling
item.description: 2014 Irish film set during the Irish War of Independence based on the 2012 novel by PJ Curtis. Directed by Garret Daly and Martina McGlynn, and written by Daly, the film stars Tara Breathnach, Muireann Bird and Gerard McCarthy. The story concerns two sisters who care for a wounded soldier. The film was released in Irish cinemas in September 2014, and received its Irish television premiere on UTV Ireland on Easter Sunday, 5 April 2015.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Field of Lost Shoes
item.description: The movie is based on a real story of Civil war in the USA. Culmination fight happened in New Market in May, 1864. The group of young cadets of Military institute of Virginia had to face horrors of the world of adults when they were called on protection of Shenandoah of Velli.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: The von Trapp Family: A Life of Music
item.description: Agathe von Trapp, the eldest daughter of a well-known musical family, overcomes many obstacles to pursue her musical career and move to the United States.
item.category: Movies Biography Drama Family Musical Romance War

item.title: War Pigs
item.description: Fighting pigs — special forces, which purpose — to destroy Nazis where they least of all expect blow.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Eye in the Sky
item.description: War changed forever. New technologies of drones allow to get into earlier inaccessible places and to prevent mass terrorist attacks. But when completion of operation becomes the same lung as pressing of one button, there is the most difficult question. Whether one decision will ruin dozens of civilians or will save thousands of lives?
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Soldiers of the Damned
item.description: The German soldiers of times of World War II take the scientist-occultist in the forest with ghosts in Romania where they are resisted by their own ghosts.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: A Perfect Day
item.description: The group of employees of humanitarian service tries to get a corpse from a well in a conflict zone. Someone threw a body there to poison water, and local people suffer from thirst. The task which seems to the elementary turns into an impracticable mission in which the worst enemy — irrationality. Workers cross the area captured by war, trying to solve this problem.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Rock the Kasbah
item.description: To nobody the necessary musical producer finds the last chance in rescue of the young girl with a gold voice in Afghanistan.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Max
item.description: Story about a dog which helped soldiers with Afghanistan. After tragic incident the dog is taken away to itself home by family of the soldier, responsible for it.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Macbeth
item.description: Cold fields of Scotland, the military camp, always ready to move to other place. Macbeth always in the war, his wife who recently lost the child is afraid to lose also the husband. To hold him nearby, she begins the project on elimination of competitors in fight for a royal crown.
item.dc:creator: Admin
